name: The Color Devil
description:
My entry to Mini Jam 69: Hell.

Story: "Hell is running out of color.. the color devil most escape to recharge her powers or end up being as dry as this story!".
The game involves traversing a 2d platformer while solving puzzles containing cards and colors.

The game is made in Gamemaker Studio 2 and the art with Aseprite.

Note:
The game is rather short. And I would have liked to play more with the card mechanics, but run out time for the gamejam. I might revisit this concept in the future!

Song: Discovery
Artist: EcroDeron
